guideline.name: FDA PGx Association [Pharmacogenetic Associations for which the Data Support Therapeutic Management Recommendations]: Flurbiprofen - CYP2C9

relatedGenes.name: cytochrome P450 family 2 subfamily C member 9

recommendations.name: Recommendation Annotation PA166311942
recommendations.population: Affected subgroup: CYP2C9 poor metabolizers or *3 carriers

text.html: "Results in higher systemic concentrations. Use a reduced dosage in poor metabolizers."
